title: Runs page server-side pagination and filtering
description: Implement proper server-side pagination and filtering on the runs list page. Currently fetches all runs without limit, causing slow load times as data grows. Wire up existing filter UI to actual API calls.
acceptance_criteria: Runs page fetches with limit (default 20-50 per page)
Pagination controls: Previous/Next buttons or infinite scroll
Suite filter dropdown populated from available suites
Status filter dropdown filters server-side (not client filter)
Proper skeleton loaders during loading (not just 'Loading...' text)
Empty state when no runs match filters
Page loads in <300ms with proper loading states
implementation_notes: API already supports limit/offset via RunsFilter type
API supports status_filter and suite_id params
Use nuqs or next/navigation for URL state sync
Skeleton loader pattern already exists in stat-cards.tsx
Consider useInfiniteQuery for infinite scroll alternative
Add total_count to API response if not present for pagination UI
This task focuses on performance; FE-030 covers full feature set
